jee.title: Jakarta Enterprise Edition (JEE)
jee.text: Spring / Spring Boot Framework, JPA, Hibernate, Tomcat Administration, 3-tier Architecture, MVC2 Model, Servlets and JSP, DAO Pattern

devops.title: DevOps Engineering
devops.text: Maven, Git, GitHub, GitLab, Jira, Jenkins, JUnit, Selenium

xml.title: XML Technology
xml.text: XML Standard, XML Databases, XML Parsers (DOM, SAX), DTD, XSD (XML Schema), XSLT, XPath, XQuery
